name: SeaSub
description:
A game where you collect trash in the sea as a little submarine. Try to collect as much trash as you can before running out of fuel.

This is my entry to the Polymars SeaJam! This is my second proper game made with Unity so it might not be that great. I still hope you enjoy!

Controls:

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move. This game uses Unity's input so other controls may work.

Donate to TeamSeas:  https://teamseas.org/

Credits

Background music: sakura Hz- chill. (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KxwQfsDHCpc)

Pallete used: https://lospec.com/palette-list/pk-32

All art assets made by me
